meanings.definition: The quality or state of being accidental.
meanings.sent1: Her accidentalness in spilling the milk surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: The accidentalness of finding a four-leaf clover brought him luck.
meanings.sent3: His accidentalness in mixing up the ingredients made the cake taste funny.
meanings.sent4: The accidentalness of their meeting felt like fate.
meanings.sent5: The accidentalness of the paint spill created a colorful masterpiece.

meanings.definition: The condition of happening by chance or unexpectedly.
meanings.sent1: The accidentalness of the rain caught us off guard.
meanings.sent2: She accepted the job offer with a sense of accidentalness.
meanings.sent3: The accidentalness of the dog stealing the sandwich was comical.
meanings.sent4: The accidentalness of the fire alarm going off during the play added drama.
meanings.sent5: The accidentalness of the shooting star left them in awe.
